prompt: Summarize the following story in first person: About 1 month ago I experienced a horrible thing. A good friend of mine died of a heroin overdose. I feel for this friend as he tried so hard to quit. He tried going to recovery several times. He lost the battle and died. I felt such greif for him. The morning after his death I woke to more bad news. Another one of my friends died of the same cause. Heroin is a hard thing to get off of but an easy thing to start. I hope that everyone can get better treatment soon. I hope that the government sees this problem. I hope the governement tries to intervene and fix the problem. These are people! These people have families who suffer for drugs. All they need is a little therapy and some love.

choices.text: We need to help these people. I wish I could have saved my friends. I wish I could have stopped them from doing heroin. I will do my best to help others in the future.
